title: A Krichever--Novikov Formulation of W--Algebras on Riemann Surfaces
abstract: It is shown how the theory of classical $W$--algebras can be formulated on a higher genus Riemann surface in the spirit of Krichever and Novikov. An intriguing relation between the theory of $A_1$ embeddings into simple Lie algebras and the holomorphic geometry of Riemann surfaces is exihibited.
